summary: Per request, level 1 saves of exact clones of the horse thief who tries to flee Helgen and the Imperial Captain who has him shot. Offered as separate downloads. Now also included as presets in \"ESP - Expanded Skyrim Presets\", along with 300+ other NPCs.
descriptionHtml:
Lokir and Prima
Version: 1.0
By c_striker


[color=#00FF00] UPDATE:[/color] I have now released a new mod, \"ESP - Expanded Skyrim Presets\", which makes these characters (along with 300+ other NPCs) available to play as presets in the character creation menu. If you\'d prefer the preset version, which allows you to customize the character or to convert your existing character via the showracemenu console command, you can find the new mod [color=yellow] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15963&tab=3&navtag=/modules/comments/comments_ajax.php?tid=658266|:|fid=15963] here[/color][/url].


Description
===========
Based on a request, this file includes level one save games of precise clones of both Lokir, the Nord horse thief who tries to escape execution at Helgen, and the female Imperial Captain who has him shot. For the purpose of this mod, I have given the Imperial Captain the name \"Prima\".

These player characters are exact replicas of the NPCs upon which they are based. For Lokir, I am also offering an alternative \"scrubbed\" version for those who may prefer a cleaner, smoother look. Their chargen settings are the same as the vanilla NPC settings, so no matter which face mods you use, if any, when you pull up the player character from the save game he/she should look exactly like your in-game NPC (unless you previously used an NPC editor to change the NPC, in which case all bets are off). If you want both the player character and its NPC counterpart to look like they do in the screenshots, then you would need to use the same mods I do, as noted below.

Each character is saved just outside the cave after escaping Helgen Keep.

If you like my work, please feel free to check out my other mods:
* \"Aela and Gormlaith\": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=52773
* \"Ahkari and Keerava\": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=53638
* \"Astrid and Karliah\": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=50370
* \"Cicero and Lucien Lachance\": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=51857
* \"Diverse Female Housecarls\": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=49520 
* \"Dromarash and Veezara\": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=51546
* \"Gabriella and Tonilia\": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=54197
* \"Hroki and Jordis\": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=50842
* \"Lisette and Muiri\": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=51033 
* \"Val - Twin Sister of Vex\": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=39781


Mods used in the screenshots
============================
Face:
* \"Better Females by Bella\": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=9747 (\"No make up just improved textures\" version)
* \"Beauty Faces by NecKros\": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=6226 (specular map only)
* \"No More Blocky Faces\" by Xenius: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=13714 (I use version 1.3)
I use a blend of these three mods. Install No More Blocky Faces first, then Bella\'s mod, then take only the specular map (femalehead_s.dds) from the NecKros mod and use it to replace the one from Bella.
The specular map is located in the following folder: textures\\actors\\character\\female
Eyes:
* \"Natural Eyes\" by nevenbridge: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=11110 (human eyes only)
Hair:
* \"Straight hair retexture\" by navetsea: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/download.php?id=13007


Installation (manual)
=====================
1. Extract the files of this mod to a temporary location (you can use 7zip: http://www.7-zip.org, to unzip them) and check the folder structure.
2. Copy the .ess files to your saved games folder, typically: \\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves
3. Launch Skyrim and load your saved game of choice. 


Incompatibility
===============
None.


Contact
=======
If you wish to contact me, please do so by leaving a comment at the mod\'s thread.


Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for the Elder Scrolls Series of games.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on: http://hammondslegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp
Thanks to the modders mentioned above for their efforts and improvements to the game.
Thanks to Nexus and the modding community for the access, tools and resources.


Tools Used
==========
Bethesda\'s Skyrim and related Creation Kit
7zip - http://www.7-zip.org/
author: c_striker
